fields.name: get lemon
fields.desc: Find an object to get the lemon out of the very hot tea.

fields.name: dig hole
fields.desc: Find an object to dig a second hole like the one shown.

fields.name: smear butter
fields.desc: Find an object to smear the butter on the bread as shown in the image.

fields.name: extinguish fire
fields.desc: Find the best vessel to get water to extinguish the fire

fields.name: step on something
fields.desc:
You need to clean the top of the shelf, but you cannot reach it properly 
with your hands. Now you have to drag something to the shelf and step on it to reach the top of the shelf.

fields.name: get potatoes out of fire
fields.desc: Find an object to get the potatoes out of the fire without burning yourself or extinguishing the fire.

fields.name: water plant
fields.desc: Find the best vessel to get water from the tap to water the plant.

fields.name: open beer
fields.desc: Find an object to open the beer bottle with.

fields.name: serve wine
fields.desc: Serve the remaining wine to one guest. Don't choose any vessel if you are better off taking the bottle itself.

fields.name: pound carpet
fields.desc: Find an object which you can pound a hanging carpet with to get the dust out of it.

fields.name: sit comfortably
fields.desc: You have to find an object to sit on comfortably. Don't choose any if you are better of sitting on the ground.

fields.name: open parcel
fields.desc: Find something to open the parcel.

fields.name: pour sugar
fields.desc: Find a tool to extract the shown amount of sugar from a pile and pour it into a tea cup with lowest possible number of tries.

fields.name: place flowers
fields.desc: Find a vessel to pour water into and place these flowers into to use them as decoration for as long as possible.
